thread.title: Tanzania: From Business Owner to Services Champion
thread.title_full: Tanzania: From Business Owner to Services Champion

title: Tanzania: From Business Owner to Services Champion
text:
Angola: Trade Inspection Technicians at Seminar in Viana 
"We are trying to improve public awareness of the constraints to national, industry and firm level competitiveness and to facilitate services exports," 
Mary says, "this is important for Tanzania's regional integration in East Africa." Getting services stakeholders together is a challenge, but one worth pursuing. As Mary points out, "services trade provides a lot of income earning opportunities for women -generally better opportunities than in other sectors. Services provide cleaner jobs and greener jobs and often more flexible family friendly jobs. But we have to build our skill sets and improve access to finance for women entrepreneurs." 
'Services trade provides a lot of income earning opportunities for women -generally better opportunities than in other sectors. Services provide cleaner jobs and greener jobs and often more flexible family friendly jobs. But we have to build our skill sets and improve access to finance for women entrepreneurs.' 
Mary Kalikawa, Managing Director of Kiroyera Tours, 
Chairwoman of the Association of Women in Tourism Tanzania Tanzania
